revised_title: A Study of a Samnite Denarius and Its Etruscan Inscriptions
tldr: The author examines a Samnite denarius and its Etruscan inscriptions, providing insights into the history, language, and culture of the ancient Etruscans and Romans. The denarius features two Etruscan inscriptions and a galeated head, which the author connects to the Roman and Samnite history of the time. The study contributes to the understanding of ancient numismatics and Etruscan language.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
